entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Very slow Intellisense & Code Completion in MAUI projects #11592
  • Performance issue related to Maui Styles #11586
    Backlog
  • Application targetting .NET 6 and Windows 10.0.22621.0 cannot be run #11585
  • Mac Catalyst target cannot be removed #11584
  • [iOS] RadioButton with custom Content cannot be selected with VoiceOver #11583
    Backlog
  • Pipeline commands fail with a dependency on maui-tizen #11579
    Backlog
  • [Android] Shadow with clipping not working properly #11578
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Collection view performance problem with "modification operations" of observable collection #11576
    Backlog
  • dotnet test fails when test project targets net6.0-windows10.0.19041 #11575
    Backlog
  • CarouselView Renders Duplicate Data Templates Multiple Times #11571

Closed

  • Overriding CreateFileProvider for BlazorWebView throws exception #8857
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Android precompile failed for visualstudio.rpccontracts.dll #11397
  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync does not wait and just returns null on Mac #11574
  • iOS map clicked event fires when tap on pin #11532
    Backlog
  • Gradient not loading on iOS #9854
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Gradient not appearing on iOS #8402
    Backlog
  • Frame.Background LinearGradientBrush not working on maccatalyst #8108
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Brushes not working in Frame #7261
    .NET 7 Planning
  • no issue #11587
  • Polyline - Fill Not Working on Triangle or Any Shape #9759
    Backlog
  • IImage Resize Cannot access a disposed object - Android #11255
    Backlog
  • Setting IsBusy causes exception/crash #9658
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Setting Page.IsBusy to true is not displaying waiting indicator #8617
  • TalkBack doesn't navigate to headings contained in StackLayout with a SemanticProperties.Description #8524
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [iOS] ImageButton in FlexLayout not clickable #11335
  • WebView on iOS using Navigating event fails with obj exception #11544

PullRequests

Created

  • Only add PG if VSM is added #11591
  • Exclude incompatible files from daily dotnet format workflow #11590
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure no crashing for < iOS 12 due to PointerGesture incompatibility #11589
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [iOS] Avoid propagate Map tap event tapping a Pin on iOS #11582
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-map
  • Fix Managing Layout Children #11581
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix ObjectDisposedException on Android resizing images #11577
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump autoformatting action to v0.2. #11580

Updated

  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    area/TabbedPage
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
